name: The tutorial (Spacespy)
description:
NOTE: FULL SCREEN MAKES GAME RUN SLOW

Made in 3 days for the Eureptus jam! The theme is 

One Level But Constantly Changing

Play as a small cube as his world slowly turns into hell, you play the same level 3 times, but spike locations have changed and so has the background, this was also my first experiment with a cutscene, I might do them more often. Enjoy!
